tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE IoT_Device_Security (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    security_level VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    privacy_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE IoT_Device { 
    device_id UUID, 
    device_name VARCHAR(255), 
    device_type VARCHAR(50), 
    security_score INT, 
    privacy_score INT, 
    last_check TIMESTAMP 
}

CREATE TABLE IoT_Devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
    firmware_version VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    last_check_in TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Device_Security (
    security_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    encryption_enabled BOOLEAN,
    antivirus_installed BOOLEAN,
    firewall_enabled BOOLEAN,
    antivirus_last_scan TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES IoT_Devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Device_Privacy (
    privacy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    data_encryption BOOLEAN,
    data_anonymization BOOLEAN,
    data_retention_period VARCHAR(50),
    data_privacy_policy TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES IoT_Devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Compliance_Status (
    compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    security_passed BOOLEAN,
    privacy_passed BOOLEAN,
    compliance_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES IoT_Devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE device_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    data_type TEXT,
    data_value TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE security_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    event_type TEXT,
    event_description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE privacy_issues (
    issue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    issue_type TEXT,
    issue_description TEXT,
    resolution_status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_audit (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    audit_type TEXT,
    audit_result TEXT,
    audit_date DATE
);
